content.detailedDescription: I went out at 7:56 to see if it was there again tonight. exact same place as yesterday...Did the same thing emitting light looking like a dragonfly or jellyfish with the lights coming off if like sunrays..I called a different neighbor tonight who watched it with me for over 20 minutes..I observed it until 8:38 when it lookex like it fell into cloud cover( ther were no clouds) and disappeared.  will be watching tomorrow. i felt fine watching it, my neighbor though was fearful of abduction.
content.summary: Bright star like or venus emitting blue/white light

content.detailedDescription: I went out at 7:56 to see if it was there again tonight. exact same place as yesterday...Did the same thing emitting light looking like a dragonfly or jellyfish with the lights coming off if like sunrays..I called a different neighbor tonight who watched it with me for over 20 minutes..I observed it until 8:38 when it lookex like it fell into cloud cover( ther were no clouds) and disappeared.  will be watching tomorrow. i felt fine watching it, my neighbor though was fearful of abduction.
content.summary: Bright star like or venus emitting blue/white light

content.detailedDescription:
I've been searching online for the past few nights trying to see if anyone experienced what my family and i saw on friday april 9th about 8:15pm. i haven't found anyone reporting on this but i find it really hard to believe that noone saw this, so i'm reporting it to see if anyone replies and validates this (i'm pretty skeptical of ufo's):
here's what we saw:
my family and i were driving east on yorba linda blvd about 8:15pm. one of my kids said with surprise to look out our windows up in sky to our left (north). there were 15+ orange-ish lights at about 1000 ft (hard to really tell) heading south-southwest. at first we thought it was a fleet of helicopters. as we drove the lights began to disappear 1 to 2 at a time. not quite sure if they were fading out or turning and heaidng another direction. 
there was a plane that went by (the lax flight path is in that direction) so i was able to get a little more perspective on the distance and altitude.
the best way to explain them is that they looked like sparks from a campfire fire after you stoke it. same orange-ish color, but these were lights. and were not acending up, but moving forward in somewhat unison. 
by the time i pulled over in a parking lot to get a good look at them there were about 5 or so left. we looked around to see if there were any other people observing, but didn't see anyone. otherwise i would have ran up to them to help validate what we were seeing. i pulled out my phone to take a video or picture, but by that time there was only one left. it seemed to get brighter and slow down, then it too eventually left. about 2 or so minutes had lapsed from the time we first saw them.

hopefully someone out there saw this too and has some sort of logical explanation. i don't want to be one of those people that says they saw something and everyone thinks they're nuts!

thanks
content.summary: 15 orange lights spotted over brea, orange county

content.detailedDescription: I was walking back home with a friend. when it suddenly got really hot and it was around 11 at night and freezing before so this was unusual. we start talking about things when a helicopter flies by very close to the ground with its search lights on we thought this was very strange so we kept walking. it got very hot again and we saw something moving in the sky so as we stare at it, the colors are a light bluish green and it had flashing yellow and almost purple flashing objects behind it as we stared it ran across the sky and stopped abrubtly to a halt as we stare directly at it, it stays that way for another 5-7 minutes then shoots off past us.
content.summary: At first looked like meteor but then stopped in its path and hovered

content.detailedDescription:
As a f16 like jet just shook my house i decided to report the event that took place at 8:20pm on april 12, 2012.. i looked outside and saw the jet insanely low making a sharp turn toward nyc ..

as for what i witnessed earlier...

 driving home south on the garden state parkway (exit158)i happened to be looking east when a blue green streak came out of nowhere and shot on a vertical ellipse leaving a streak across the sky. it must of been a total of 3 seconds. i was so taken back i stopped talking to a friend who i was on the phone with.  not a shooting star or a meteor shower ...Nothing like it.
content.summary: Blue green streak in the sky near paramus nj..

content.detailedDescription: Stood outside and was looking at stars all of a sudden from no where a light appeared and moved across the sky it was round and bright it moved south to north and at one point it became very bright then settled back down to its original size, .I called my wife and son outside to view this sighting becuase i saw it 2 nights in a row and it was un believable that i went outside the 2cd night and it was there again it stayed bright white the whole time other then the brightning moments i watched this object 2 nights in a row about the same time , both nights i watched this object pass in front of an aircraft that had visible flashing red,green and white aircraft lights, i have other reports from as far back as 1986 also that would make you think twice about going outside.I am going to try and get the light on film, 3 summers ago we saw these same lights night after night in a different part of the sky so i thingk i can get it in sight again. its creepy as hell
content.summary: I have witnessed these lights for 5 years now , some extreme brightness changes

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in my back yard letting my dog out around 10:30 pm on 4/11/12.  i had my phone out messing around playing a game or something. getting ready to go back up the stairs on the deck to enter my house, i caught a light moving in the sky out of the corner of my eye.  i thought a shooting star.  then i looked up at it and it was definitely not a shooting star.  

there was three round/orb bluish/white lights in the sky in a tight triangle formation.  very symmetric.  there was a yellowish/greenish "ring" around them.  very similar to what a rack for pool balls looks like.  it was above my neighbors house.  moving towards the west.  it was not very high in the sky, though not particularly close to the ground either.  it did not make any sounds.  it moved west and accelerated then disappeared behind the eave of my neighbors house.  i ran up the driveway, only a matter of 2 seconds but it was gone.  i didn't see lights trailing off in the distance or anything. just gone.  the whole event lasted less than 5 seconds.  i seen it in the corner of my eye, looked, realized it wasn't a shooting star like i thought, wondered what i was seeing, and it accelerated and was gone just like that. 

i am skeptic on all things like this.  i have a range of feelings.  doubt, amazement, excited, embarrassed, weirded out. it is the first time i have ever seen anything remotely like that.  i live close to where a major airport as one of its landing runways facing.  i'm used to seeing planes come in for landings over my neighborhood.  i've seen satellites, shooting stars, night parachuters, people floating plastic grocery bags with tea candles in them.  but i have never, ever seen anything like that object in the sky.
content.summary: 3 orb lights triangle formation surrounded by pool rack type yellowish ring.  moved in straight line then accelerated out of sight fast.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself, my wife and my father-in-law all witnessed a ufo in the skies above south east london during a storm in the distance. it was a spherical object, and we noticed it from the balcony of my in-laws flat.

it was darting in and out of a dark grey storm cloud at odd angles of trajectory, and at great speed. it did this for about 2-3 minutes. i witnessed it again about 5 minutes later, but this time it was moving faster and had a visible trail behind it. we all lost sight of it after then, and the storm clouds dissipaited about 15 minutes later.
content.summary: Observed a ufo during a storm darting through clouds at speed.

content.detailedDescription: Standing out front of our house facing west in perkasie pa around 8pm. my boyfriend saw a white bullet shaped object and called it to my attention. when i looked up object and the white streak behind it changed into blue-green(much like the aurora borealis colors). the object was on a curved downward motion. it then split in two separate objects and completely disappeared. the whole sighting lasted only 10 seconds.
content.summary: Bullet shaped object white turning blue green streaked on a downward curve, broke into two and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside this evening we saw a bright light. we see planes and stars each night but this was neither. we went into the house and got the binoculars and went back to see if we could get a better look. well we did. three sets of three lights sittting diagonally. it is now 10:22pm and it is still there. it moves up and down in the sky but we still can't make out what it is. it is now starting to move northwest. can someone comfirm?
content.summary: Bright lights object moves up and down

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from dinner with my fiance. we pulled into our development and my finance looked out my window ( driver's side) and spotted three orangeish glowing lights in the sky. he said, those are not planes. at first i did not believe him but once we pulled over in our development and got out of the car. i saw the three orange lights and looked over behind the tree line behind the development and saw more of the same orange lights. this time i saw about 8 together in a cluster they seemed to be following eachother and then descended higher behind a cloud. some of the lights were closer together and some were further behind..
once they hit the cloud above they disappeared. after both clusters, i saw a more orange lights flying individually until there was one left and that one too disappeared upward. they moved quickly and without any sound.

i personally thought they were plans and did not believe it, but after i saw a hand-ful that were so low, i knew those were not planes. we saw several planes above... i kept thinking how are the pilots not seeing this?!

right after we experienced this we stood outside longer to see if anymore would come. we both smelled the air and it smelt like burnt plastic... not a great smell and not sure if it had an relation but it is ironic.
 i then came in and went right on goggle to see if anyone else has seen this. once i got on utube and saw video of the same exact thing i saw- then i really believed this is something unique..

2 weeks ago in lancaster pa- someone posted they saw the same thing...
pa must be a hot spot, do we know what this means?
content.summary: Yellow- orange ufo spotted in quakertown, pa

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on parkways south from work around exit 98.  in plain visible sight below cloud cover a missile shaped object with green trail (afterburner?) behind it.  sighting lasted only a few seconds.  was listening to music streaming from cell phone internet.  music cut out during sighting.  right after sighting a few second long down pour of rain occurred.  could not follow object beyond tree line.  object was gone before i could take a picture.
content.summary: Strange object flies westward from atlantic ocean leaves green trail.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on parkways south from work around exit 98.  in plain visible sight below cloud cover a missile shaped object with green trail (afterburner?) behind it.  sighting lasted only a few seconds.  was listening to music streaming from cell phone internet.  music cut out during sighting.  right after sighting a few second long down pour of rain occurred.  could not follow object beyond tree line.  object was gone before i could take a picture.
content.summary: Strange object flies westward from atlantic ocean leaves green trail.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on parkways south from work around exit 98.  in plain visible sight below cloud cover a missile shaped object with green trail (afterburner?) behind it.  sighting lasted only a few seconds.  was listening to music streaming from cell phone internet.  music cut out during sighting.  right after sighting a few second long down pour of rain occurred.  could not follow object beyond tree line.  object was gone before i could take a picture.
content.summary: Strange object flies westward from atlantic ocean leaves green trail.

content.detailedDescription:
Looked like a meteor that bounced off of the atmosphere
was in the s/sw sky and at arms lenth left aproxamately a 9in trail
in cloudless sky. other sightings that i had heard about on c2c last night
aproxamated the same thing. but by definition it is unknown.
content.summary: Probable space rock

content.detailedDescription: It was a windy day and i was walking towards the mountain due west when i saw the disc moving north to south just above the top of this mountain, or horizon as it appears to me. in light of all the sightings i have seen that were spectacular, this one was just another sighting albeit a dull one at that of which i see them constantly and are all around me. i happen to be close to the seti arrays with this sighting.
content.summary: Dull white disc flying north to south

content.detailedDescription: I was five stories up on a rooftop looking to the east horizon looking out towards lake michigan observing air traffic coming from the east.  out of nowhere this huge rapid flashing like star just appears before my eyes right in front of the flight path.  when the closest plane approached, this object desends down to horizon height.  after a second plane flew by it climbed to original spot.  all of a sudden this green flourescent meteor like display falls from north to south, not breaking apart or appear like it was burning up in the atmosphere.  moments later the object just vanished like someone turned a light switch off.
content.summary: Much larger thanairlines traffic flying right past object
content.locationName: East of Winnetka over Lak, Illinois

content.detailedDescription:
on march 19, 2012, at exactly 2100 hours, i was walking in the parking lot at vulcan materials, my work place. a meteor caught my eye and i looked up. i saw two more meteors all from about the same point, but going in slightly different directions. these were not the white streak meteors, but had the orange glow of low altitude meteors. 
     as i watched this, a bright red-orange light appeared in the same location. it was blinking almost but not quite perfectly. it made a u turn at such speed that it left a streak. it made a large circle in the sky, (would have fit inside orion), but very erratic, reminding me of the way a house fly makes a circle around a room, in, out, u turns, and blinking the whole time and leaving tracers. appx. 1/2 sec. on, 1/2 sec. off.
     after a few seconds, the light dissapeared for maybe 2 or 4 seconds. it then reappeared several degrees to the north at a higher altitude. it had lost the color and size and was white and starlike. it made another eratic circle as before, for about the same mount of time, than disappeared for good. 
     there were no clouds and visibility was unlimited.There were two aircraft in the air at the time.One to my north and the other to my south. both were flying in a westerly direction. they were flying fairly slow, so i assume they were prop planes. im would estimate the altitude for both planes at appx. 20,000 ft. the site is also less that one mile from the chattanooga      metropolitan airport.
     the light i saw was between venus and orion, (jupiter was also visible fairly close to venus. if you drew a line from venus to the three kings of orion, the light was just above that line right in the middle. that would be close to 45 degrees to the west. when the light appeared the second time, it was on the north side of venus. i can only guess the altitude of thy light as i had no reference.
content.summary: Saw a blinking light larger than venus, making circles in an eratic pattern.

content.detailedDescription: Just wanting to clarify that this object is in the upper right hand corner.Had to zoom in to see.The pink blob and red arc are just lens flare.This sighting has been misconscrewed as the pink blob as the object,not so....Along with the pic i sent in a couple of yrs ago.,it really makes you wonder what is floating/traveling out there that we cannot see with the naked eye!!!!People tend to think ufos are either disc shaped or triangle,and etc.These objects are still ufos-but a different sort???I am resending with more clarity,the same pic and the other one from 2010..Thank you
content.summary: Just caught my eye in the upper hand right corner,after downloading.Pink blob is just lens flare......

content.detailedDescription: This particular sighting occurred on dauphin island near mobile alabama. i decided to take my son to the beach for spring break. we checked in at 1:00 in the afternoon and made way for the beaches for a wonderful time. evening came and we made our way back to the motel. we had some dinner and my son wanted to watch some cartoons and relax. the time was approaching 7:00pm and the sun had just set beyond the horizon. we were on the second floor with a fabulous view towards the west and i could already see venus and jupiter in all of their splendor. immediately i recognized a strange orange star directly over the west end tip of the island. the object could be seen through a couple of palm trees. thinking the object was out of place, i set a line of sight, aligned the star adjacent to the vertical plain of a palm tree and then rested my elbows on the rail to hold that line of sight. after a couple of seconds i could clearly see the object was slowly moving northward. i re positioned my line of sight for confirmation and confirmed that the object was indeed creeping towards the north which was completely uncharacteristic of normal star trajectory. star trajectory in that part of the sky should ark towards the west-north-west. after nearly half an hour i realized the object was neither growing or fading in intensity and had moved towards the north only by a fraction of an inch at arms length. this was not an aircraft and not a star! i happened to bring my laser pointer along so i directed a beam of light near and around the object while carefully avoiding any direct beam-shot just in case it was an aircraft. immediately the object began to slightly pulse. confident that this was no airplane or helicopter, i hit the object with one quick direct burst. instantly, the thing vanished into thin air as if a light switch was turned off. suddenly, a bright white object appeared over the motel traveling due north at a swift and steady pace. knowing that this was no aircraft either, i hit that object with a quick burst and witnessed a bright flash back at me. once the flash was delivered to me, the object rapidly, yet un-instantaneously disappeared overhead. this was a new confirmation for me which adds to the list that these objects or the beings inside them are: 1:intelligent. 2:attracted to laser projections. 3:communicate with light. 4:appear and disappear through portals. 5:able to maneuver unlike any know human craft. 6:hear, understand and act upon human thought processes 7:able to apply maximum covert maneuverability. i have been witness to unusual events mostly occurring over my home and now at other destinations. there is a fear associated with these events. a fear of the unknown. who are they? what are they doing? what are their intentions? these are honest questions that deserve honest answers. but does anyone really know the answers?
content.summary: Everywhere i go, there they are! they are everywhere!

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my friends apartment around 10:00 pm on 4/11/12 located in rochester hills, michigan .  i was looking up at the star filled sky and noticed a very bright almost round shaped object that would go from a glow to a strong brightness sometimes change shape and occasional green and red lights would appear.

i immediately got into my van - as i tried to start my van the side back seat doors opened and closed by themselves before the van was even started.

this made me a bit nervous.  drove to my home in rochester, mi about 15-20 minutes from my friends apartment.  

i kept my eye on the object the whole drive home.

when arriving home my husband and 2 teenage sons (14 & 17) went outside with binoculars.  the kids who have been non-believers in the past and having better eyes observed more detail.  they also saw the object change shape and brightness levels along with the red and green occasional lights appear.  but what they could  also see was  a light tail appearing from the bottom of the object and windows.

also present in the night sky was 3 faint red/pink round shapes that did not move.  

there were commercial airplanes flying higher then ufos .

we observed the objects until 10:45 pm - it was cold and getting late for bed.

i observed the object off and on from house window until 11:30pm.  thought i heard a helicopter fly by around this time - but could not spot.

checked one more time at 12:00 am and sky was completely cloudy.

when getting up at 6:00 am next day, 4/12/12, only saw half moon with a clear sky.

my husband reaction was of amazement and feels comfortable. he also has seen the same 3 ufos i saw over the last 2 years.

the kids were also amazed but embarrassed as it sound like we are nut cases.

i am usually the one who first sees ufo"s, third in 2 years.  so it makes me a bit uncomfortable. i am very intuitive with people.

the part about the van doors was eerie - at first i thought someone had hid in my parked van or just jumped in - gave me the creeps.

my son tried to video and take pictures with his high powered camera - but too far away.
content.summary: Saw stationary bright glowing object that would change shape slightly with occasional red and green lights.  also in the sky filled with many stars were 3 faint red/pink round lights.                       re 3 other soft pink

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back patio talking with my brother over the phone. i was laying back in my chair and looking almost strait up and facing ese. i saw a dim blue light appear dead center of my field of view. it then increased in brightness equal to or even exceeding that of venus, then gradually faded the same way it began. the whole thing was +/- five seconds in duration. that is really about the extent of it. however, this is the second time i have witnessed this. i saw the exact same thing for the same duration at the same location about a month ago. it was also about 80 degrees above the horizon but i was facing almost due south on this occasion. i never reported this one because up until now, i thought my eyes were just playing tricks on me, or a cloud had passed between me and my view of some planet. last night's occurance was right in front of my face and the sky was quite clear. i feel compelled to add that i never thought that i would be reporting such a thing. i always thought of ufos quite jokingly until now. i will not go outside without my camera anymore. i'll try to get you guys some pics or vid if it ever happens again.
content.summary: Single light gradually increased to the brightness of venus, then gradually faded away.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside around 9:25 waiting for a ride. noticed lighted object in the sky toward ese. it looked like a burning plane or firework remnant. was travelling nearly straight down toward 5 o clock position at freefall speed.I lost sight of it behind trees and buildings before it reached ground level however. 40 minutes later i noticed a low flying helicopter in a neighborhood near that area as well.
content.summary: I was facing ese object appeared to be falling nearly straight down

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my easy chair which faces west on the 2nd floor watching american idol. i had the lani blinds fully open and and the sliders open.
from where i was sitting i can see quite a large area outside. it was approximately 8:40pm 2 redish orange lights appeared on the western horizon traveling at a steady speed. my wife was sitting in a chair next to me. i jumped up and called her to see the ufo's. we both stood in the lanai and observed them flying side by side. when they were exactly over head a 3rd object appeared at a higer rate of speed ( like trying to catch up to the other 2. we ran to the front of the house and saw the other 2 for about a couple of min and poof they vanished the third came over head and it vanished. my wife does not believe in ufo's i asked her now do you believe she said i can't explain what we saw it was weird because there was no sound. 
it was calm no clouds and very clear no airplanes or helocopters nor were these satelights. as they were flying too fast to be any one of the above.I wish i had the time to grab my camera but we were both excited at what we saw. writing this the next day i still have goose bumps.
content.summary: Travel from west to southeast disapered slightly overhead pulsating orange/red and yellow

content.detailedDescription: Was listening to coast to coast, and george mentioned that someone had just reported a fireball over michigan, i took the dog out to do her business and within 3 min. a fireball appeared directly overhead going north/east lasted about three seconds.....Didn't look anything like any falling star i ever saw this had a definite fire as a con-trail
content.summary: Fireball

content.detailedDescription: Around midnight i was sitting on the balcony of a hotel room. my head was facing the sky. object flew over my head and i saw it about five seconds. the object was shaped like a hexagon with rectangular sides and a square base. cherry was the color of the shell and had two lights on one side who was facing the ground. lights was very small in comparison to the size of the object. lights was rectangular in shape and looked like from old cars. lights were red. object did not emit any sounds, and smells
content.summary: Around midnight i was sitting on the balcony of a hotel room. my head was facing the sky. object flew over my head without a sound

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog out.. i always look at the sky. i thought it was a star or venus at first. then it turned and got much bigger.  then the lights started radiating from the middle of it ut blue and white like sunrays.  then it sucked the lights back in..Maybe 15 seconds later it did the same thing.  it looked like a prism...I watched it for a while and then i called my neighbor to come out and see it...She told me it was a galaxy and went back in.  i toom some pictures with my phone and went back in.,..I just looked form it snd it is gone.I felt awesome watching it.
content.summary: Looked like dragonfly blue white lights similar to sun rays

content.detailedDescription: We were taking a break at work on he graveyard shift, all of a sudden we all look up and these lights were "dancing" around in the sky. when i ran in to get my camera phone, the phenomena was over.
content.summary: Cluster of lights moving at odd varrying speeds

content.detailedDescription:
About a month ago my wife informed me of a planetary alignment that's infrequent.  mars (or venus), jupiter and the moon were going to be in configuration with each other.  i observed it and it was magnificent.  i watched the configuration over the next few nights, then weeks.  during this time the moon moved away and the two planets remained in line with each other with the closest planet (again, either mars or venus) being the biggest and brightest and the distant jupiter up in the far right angle of the sky.  note:  when this phenomenon first manifested it was almost directly west but as the days and weeks went on it moved more southwest.

tonight (wednesday - april 11th at 10:15 p.M. eastern time) i went to the store for milk.  as i exited my car i looked up in the sky to observe the familiar sight i'd been observing for the past several weeks on almost a nightly basis.  however, tonight was different and caused me to pause for several minutes in the parking lot.  the closest planet (mars or venus) was now much closer and had changed from a white color to a dirty amber.  it's light that it gave off was "hectic" - moving about at a quick pace. jupiter was still where it should be and showed no unusual characteristics.  after observing this i went into the grocery store and obtained what i needed.  during checkout i felt that someone should observe what i had just observed if only to break up their night behind the checkout.  i told the women who i'd become acquainted with through my visits to the grocery store that when time permitted she should step out into the lot and take a look at how bright the one planet was.  she followed me out and as i stepped down from the curb i already had my hand in the air with my finger pointed in the direction of the planet.  but when i looked only distant jupiter was visible.  mars (or venus) was gone.  completely.  for the first time in over a month.  i walked frantically around the parking lot thinking i was standing in the wrong spot.  the grocery clerk lost interest and went back inside the store.  i never was able to re-establish acclimation with the object.

once arriving home i jumped out of the suv and ran to the side of my house where i'd observed this planetary alignment for the past few weeks.  again, the object was gone.  

i'm left with a dilemma:  i feel that what i initially viewed over a month ago when my wife brought the planetary alignment's attention to me was in fact a planet.  and all of the nights since.  but what i viewed tonight i only assumed was the planet due to it's location.  but it was bigger, brighter and of different color than the other nights.

my two questions are - what was i observing (both tonight and for the past several weeks) if it wasn't a planet and, if it was a planet that it's appearance somehow changed due to atmospheric conditions then why didn't a planet show in it's place in the sky as it had for four weeks prior?
content.summary: Like a large star - amber - had been present for month - same location- disappeared tonight

content.detailedDescription: I was at my friends house when we saw what looked like an orange star. it moved to the left and right dimming and lighting up. it then moved out of view and we did not see it again. this is the second night in a row we seen this!
content.summary: Orange ufo!!!! 2 night in a row!
